oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Business - Patent Button Company and Courthouse Grill
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nashville firefighters check billboards announcing Fire Prevention Week atop the Patent Button Company, on the north side of the Nashville Public Square. The adjacent building at the corner of the public square and 2nd Avenue North is home to the Courthouse Grill. 3 x 4 in.
